__e: GDPR - European General Data Protection Regulation
In accordance with the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) through technical and organizational measures.
Your data will be treated confidentially, in accordance with the European Regulations (RGPD) and in agreement with our Personal Data Protection Policy.
For more information about RGPD and cookies, you can read our Privacy Policy
* To comply with the RGPD Data Protection Law and that your data is safe, you must read and accept our Privacy Policy*
In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDRP), you allow us to contact you using the data you have sent to us. This data is automatically deleted after each consultation.
The new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) entered into force on 25 May 2018.
Since 25 May 2018, the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) has been implemented throughout Europe.
The European Law on the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) has entered into force since 25 May 2018.
Privacy statement as per Art. 13 of EU Regulation no. 2016/679 (GDPR) (further information)
The legally binding form of the Privacy Statement in accordance with GDPR is the German form.
GDPR compatible: we guarantee your data wil be used only on professional purpose and will be retained maximum one year, in order to answer the request mentionned in this form.
